Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter

Class DynamicTypeBinderAdapter<E extends Enum<E>,VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<?>>

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<VH>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.DynamicRecyclerViewAdapter<RecyclerView.ViewHolder>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.DynamicBinderAdapter<VB>
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.recyclerview.adapter.DynamicTypeBinderAdapter<E,VB>
Type Parameters:
E - The type of the enum this adapter will receive.
VB - The type of the dynamic recycler view binder.
Direct Known Subclasses:
TypeDataBinderAdapter
public abstract class DynamicTypeBinderAdapter<E extends Enum<E>,VB extends DynamicRecyclerViewBinder<?>> extends DynamicBinderAdapter<VB>
A DynamicBinderAdapter to display different type of DynamicTypeBinderAdapter inside a recycler view.
